articles.title: Elon Musk says he is launching new America Party - BBC
articles.description: The world's richest man says he is setting up a new political organisation called the America Party.
articles.content:
Sean Seddon & Stuart Lau
Elon Musk says he is launching a new political party, weeks after dramatically falling out with US President Donald Trump.
The billionaire announced on his social media… [+3038 chars]
